content:
cjgillot said:

I feel like I need to dive right into the resolver to understand it better. Do you have any "I'd be great if" refactoring to give me as an exercise?

this is a really cool template that I've used myself (or had used "on me"), and yet I always forget about it, and I'm not sure if we have a good way for newcomers who are looking to educate themselves to know about these work items
arguably the E-easy AND E-mentor list might provide a rough-approximation of this, except that its not necessarily easy to map each item on that list to a corresponding "part of the code base"
